Detailed Description

BioMatch Flex H Header File.

Contains the definitions and functionality for Precise Biometrics BioMatch Flex H technology.

Function Documentation

int PBCALL pb_fh_create_enrollment_data ( const pb_image_t *  image,
int  far_level,
unsigned char **  reference_data,
unsigned int *  reference_data_length,
unsigned char **  header_data,
unsigned int *  header_data_length 
)

Creates reference data and header data for storage on card.

Used to create the enrollment data from a fingerprint image that is to be stored on a smart card. Reference and header data needs to be freed with pb_free() when they are no longer needed.

Parameters:
[in] image The image used to create enrollment data from.
[in] far_level The requested maximum FAR of future verifications.
[out] reference_data The newly created reference data.
[out] reference_data_length Length of the reference data.
[out] header_data The newly created header data.
[out] header_data_length Length of the header data.
Return values:
PB_EOK if successful.
PB_ETRIAL if trial validation was not successful.
Returns:
Other possible return values are defined in error codes.

int PBCALL pb_fh_create_verification_data ( const pb_image_t *  image,
const unsigned char *  header_data,
unsigned int  header_data_length,
unsigned char **  verification_data,
unsigned int *  verification_data_length 
)

Creates verification data for match-on-card.

Used to create verification data from a fingerprint image that is to be used for biometric matching on a BioMatch Flex H enabled smart card. Verification_data needs to be freed with pb_free() when it is no longer needed.

Parameters:
[in] image The image used to create verification data from.
[in] header_data The header data retrieved from the smart card.
[in] header_data_length Length of the header data.
[out] verification_data The newly created verification data.
[out] verification_data_length Length of the verification data.
Return values:
PB_EOK if successful.
PB_ETRIAL if trial validation was not successful.
Returns:
Other possible return values are defined in error codes.

int PBCALL pb_fh_validate_template ( const pb_image_t *  image,
const unsigned char *  header_data,
unsigned int  header_data_length,
const unsigned char *  reference_data,
unsigned int  reference_data_length,
int *  validated 
)

Validates the quality of an image relative to a MoC BioMatch Flex H template.

This function can be used to validate enrollment data against an image before it is stored on the smart card.

Parameters:
[in] image The image to compare with the MoC template.
[in] header_data Header data from previous call to pb_fh_create_enrollment_data().
[in] header_data_length Length of header data
[in] reference_data Reference data from previous call to pb_fh_create_enrollment_data().
[in] reference_data_length Length of reference data.
[out] validated Validation flag. PB_TRUE if the image quality is good enough relative to the template, PB_FALSE otherwise.
Return values:
PB_EOK if successful.
Returns:
Other possible return values are defined in error codes.
